com.zhonghu.sip.utils

类 PhoneCapabilityTester

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zhonghu.sip.utils.PhoneCapabilityTester

  • public final class PhoneCapabilityTester
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides static functions to quickly test the capabilities of this device. The static members are not safe for threading

    • 构造器概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • isIntentRegistered

        public static boolean isIntentRegistered(Context context,
                                         Intent intent)
        Tests whether the Intent has a receiver registered. This can be used to show/hide functionality (like Phone, SMS)

      • getPossibleActivities

        public static java.util.List<ResolveInfo> getPossibleActivities(Context ctxt,
                                                                Intent i)
        Resolve the intent as a activity receiver and return all activities related
        参数:
        ctxt - The application content
        i - the intent to resolve
        返回:
        List of resolved info

      • isPhone

        public static boolean isPhone(Context context)
        Returns true if this device can be used to make phone calls

      • deinit

        public static void deinit()

      • getPriviledgedIntent

        public static Intent getPriviledgedIntent(java.lang.String number)
        Returns true if this device can be used to make sip calls

      • resolveActivitiesForPriviledgedCall

        public static final java.util.List<ResolveInfo> resolveActivitiesForPriviledgedCall(Context ctxt)
        Find packages registered for priviledged call management
        参数:
        ctxt - the application context
        返回:
        list of package resolved info for a priviledged call intent

      • resolveActivityForPriviledgedCall

        public static final ResolveInfo resolveActivityForPriviledgedCall(Context ctxt)

      • isSmsIntentRegistered

        public static boolean isSmsIntentRegistered(Context context)
        Returns true if the device has an SMS application installed.
